Text: Right - let's summarize this : it's 4 hours into the show and all we have is one seed and zero leechers.  My hunch is that this thing is too big and no-one wants to waste bandwidth on something unknown.  So, why don't you break it up into manageable chunks, that we can try piecemeal.  That way we can build up a little trust here and all contribute to making this a success.
